statements: UPDATE user_preferences SET theme = 'dark', last_login = NOW() WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE user_preferences SET customization_settings = '{"font_size": 14, "accent_color": "blue"}', language = 'spanish' WHERE user_id = 'c7b830fa-2d4d-4f27-b3e8-7102c71a7a9f'

UPDATE user_preferences SET theme = 'dark', language = 'english', last_login = NOW(), customization_settings = '{"font_size": 14, "color_scheme": "blue"}' WHERE user_id = 'e7d4b6f3-8677-4f2f-a455-6d65f92b98b5'

UPDATE user_preferences SET last_login = NOW(), customization_settings = '{"font_size": 16, "color_scheme": "green"}', theme = 'light', language = 'french' WHERE user_id = 'a8be8741-5178-4979-8510-3fc9bce4e5d1'
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_1 = 'new_value_1' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE content_recommendations SET rating = 5.0, user_id = 2 WHERE recommendation_id = 3;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_1 = 'new_value_1', preference_2 = 'new_value_2' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE content_recommendations SET rating = 4.5, user_id = 54321 WHERE recommendation_id = 67890;
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE courses SET description='A new description for the course' WHERE course_id=5;
UPDATE users SET preferences = '{"theme": "dark"}' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET description = 'New description', category = 'Programming' WHERE course_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET theme = 'dark' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email='new.email@example.com' WHERE user_id=100
UPDATE preferences SET theme='dark', language='French' WHERE user_id=200
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE username = 'Alice';
UPDATE preferences SET theme = 'dark', language = 'Spanish' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE preferences SET language = 'Spanish' WHERE user_id = 123 AND theme = 'Dark';
